short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track hints for NY Times Spelling Bee game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Love the New York Times Spelling Bee game? Install Helper Bee to keep track of the hints and how many answers of each type you have remaining. You can hide or show the Helper Bee any time with one click. Now updated with option to hide completed letter rows.

Designed for PC. Not usable on Phone or tablet.
